l: Here rest Deave, he will be missed:tb_deave
I... I miss you friend... I truly miss you...:puddle
Things have not been the same since you’ve been gone, not as fun as it was
I really wish I could have spent more time with you...::0
Oh crap ! This guy wasn’t joking with the whole “getting you out of here”:deave
Puddle ? Is this you ? What are you doing here ?
Dea ... Dea ... Deave ? Is this you ? I must be dreaming, is this really you ?:puddle
Yeah it’s me buddy ! I don’t really know I got here though ...:deave
I’ve met some weird dude in the Death World and my head must be unpleasant so much so that he kick me right up to the world of the living

*looks at himself *
Oooh ! I see why you didn’t recognise me, weird, must be a side effect of what he did to me
Are you ok bud ?
I don’t know, my dead best friend just came out of nowhere, grayed out and ...:puddle
I’ve missed you Deave
I’ve missed you Puddle. *hugs Puddle* But you have to move on you can’t hold to dead people for ever:deave
I guess ... all the time with you is always extra anyway:puddle
Thanks a lot dude, I guess you could start asking that snail over there he might have seen them.:deave:1
Hi, I’m Puddle, my friend over there is kind of trapped here:puddle
I’m looking for his colors so I can help him cross over to the Death World
Did you see anything weird lately ?
Oh hi there, I’m Snail ! That’s seems quite a story you got here:snail
Well I’ve seen some colorful shards fall down the sky around the time your friend arrived that might be it

Oh really?
 That must be it ! Did you see where they fell ?:puddle
Yes near the well over there. You should check it out.:snail
Thank you so much Snail, I will check it out !:puddle:0
You look around the well and see a small crater, probably where the colors fell.:well
Besides the hole, a set of what looks like mouse footstep can be seen::0
Oh you find the last color of mine !:deave
Thank you so much I need to go now bye friend !::0
I need my colors before get back to the Death World, can you find them ?:deave
He.. Hello:puddle
I can’t ! I can't, I'm going to kill him, I swear I’m going to kill him !:mouse1
Well I’d like to see that ! It’s not with your small arms that you’re going to do anything!:mouse2
Ummh ! I’m sorry to bother you but I’m looking for some artifact, some sort of colorful shards.:puddle
I was following some footsteps and it led me to you, did you, by any chance, grab them ? I really need them to help a friend
I’m sure Mouse 1 found them, stealing is his style !:mouse2
Oh don’t you dare put that on me, I couldn’t care less about shard or whatever !:mouse1
Please, I really need those, it’s really important to me.:puddle
Alright, listen dude I have one of them...:mouse1
Ha! See I told you he was the stealing type !:mouse2
... but I’m not going to give them to you unless I get the keys to the shop that my brother refuses to give to me.:mouse1
It’s not that I don’t want to, it's that I don’t have them you do !:mouse2
Well you see the issue here, good luck on convincing this butthead:mouse1
But I don't know where your keys are...:puddle
Are these yours ?:puddle
There we go, I told you I didn’t have them !:mouse2
You always think I’m a liar anyway whatever I do
Well for once it was not you !:mouse1
You know you guys should not be fighting like this...:puddle
I just lost my best friend... and... let’s just say it was really hard
I regret not cherishing the moment with him more
Don’t be like me, don’t regret not being close to one another, because when Death’s come, apologies won’t be enough
I’m sorry about your friend and I guess you’re right, I was too hard on you Mouse 2:mouse1
I’m sorry
It’s alright. *Hugs Mouse 1* Just try to not lose the keys next time:mouse2

Haha very funny.
Anyway here is your shard thank you for your help:mouse1
Thank you, I'll go give it to him !:puddle:0
Did you find our key?:mouse1
Hi here is the key for debug purpose:0

Grr ... I can't talk to you right now !
 My brother pissed me off !:mouse1
Oh man! I'm in trouble! Oh man!:fox
Please can you help me ?:fox
Yes but I'm in a hurry I'm looking for some colors for my friend so he can go back to the Death World ?:puddle
Oh I found one earlier if you help me write a small poem for my dear Suzy I'll give it to you!:fox
Ok, what should I write about?:puddle
Well I made a big mistake and I want to apologize do you think you can find something in these line?:fox
Let me try!:puddle:0
Is this ok?:puddle
That's perfect! Thank you so much, I hope she can forgive me! Here's your color:fox:1
Tnanks! Bye!:puddle
Oh great you found the color of my beak ! Let me try it on !:deave:0
Perfect! It looks great
Oh great you found the color of my furr ! Let me try it on !:deave:0
Perfect! It looks great
